message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.NE 

This paper deals with natural language processing and machine learning techniques to improve monolingual sentence alignment for text simplification. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also uses a convolutional neural network structure, which falls under the category of cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Additionally, the paper involves training the model in a semi-supervised way, which is a common technique in the field of machine learning and falls under the category of cs.LG (Learning). The paper also involves information retrieval techniques to improve the performance of the knowledge-based method, which falls under the category of cs.IR (Information Retrieval). Finally, the paper involves adapting the model by a small hand-aligned dataset, which falls under the category of cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing).
